frameset.edef: drop, go down, esp of financial usage

example.parse: (S-HLN (VP (IV3MS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I ينخفض) (NP-SBJ (NOUN+CASE_DEF_NOM عدد) (NP (POSS_PRON_3FS ها))) (PP (PREP إلى) (NP (NOUN_NUM+NSUFF_MASC_DU_GEN الفين))) (NP-TMP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_ACC نهاية) (NP (NP (DEM_PRON_F هذه)) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN السنة))))))

arg.g: at the end of this year
